Find the shortest path between the &s to get your answer. (If you want it: [Solved hashi puzzle](00-location-bridges.png).)
Partial Answer: Brick

puzzle.title: Cut And
puzzle.hint: As you match edges of the triangle, tape them together to form a 3D shape.

MATCH:
- Sweet & low - Born & Raised - Big & Little - Past & Future - Romeo & Juliet - Silver & Gold - Point & Click - Boom & Bust - Life & Death - Rich & Poor - Mortar & Pestle - Anxiety & Worry
For each pair you'll want to extract one letter. The flavor text shows you how to do this with Tea & Scones
Take the only letter each pair has in common
Follow the line from start here taking each letter for your final answer.
WRITE LIBERTY
LIBERTY

puzzle.title: Search And
puzzle.hint: Start with finding the words like a normal word-search
Read the remaining letters in the grid
SEE LETTERS AT INTERSECTIONS OR ENDS. DRAW LINES BETWEEN, GUIDED BY NONSENSE. DRAW NEW LETTERS.1. For each of the left-column clues, you need to find two words from the SPELL NEW WORD
Notice how the word bank words visually make an
Use the nonsense letters at the bottom to trace paths along the ampersand. Recording these will give you new letters.

puzzle.title: Mix And
puzzle.hint: For each of the left-column clues, you need to find two words from the lower word bank to put together to have its meaning.
The Latin for for & is 'et
You'll notice that putting together the words leaves you with two extra letters compared to the answer blanks.
nagram the word pairs, minus an E and a T to get something that means the right-hand column

Word Pairs:
- Car harness: seat belt - Brain-Eye route: optic nerve - Smoother: more flat - True Motive: real intent - Pit Crew: race team - Election: voters decide - Re-measure: test again - Typhoon: great wind - Drizzle: gentle rain

Anagrams:
- STABLE : S - PROVINCE : O - FORMAL : F - INTERNAL : T - CAMERA : M - DISCOVERED : E - AGAINST : T - DRAWING : A - LEARNING : L
Repeat the same mechanism as above for the final answer

puzzle.title: And Shut ( meta puzzle )
puzzle.hint: Use the clues (in verticle columns) to match up the answers with the titles of their puzzle
The answers alone don't fit. Maybe the theme can help you find words that do?

The words you want are:
- Liberty & Justice - Command & Control - Terms & Conditions - Flotsam & Jetsam
You need to change the order of the letters within their column only when you drop them down.

puzzle.title: Form And (bonus puzzle)
puzzle.hint: Start by counting the number of &s of each font.
Count into (index) its matching font name by the number of &s counted.

FONT MATCHES:
- 8 - Helvetica - 8 - Boogaloo - 3 - Times New Roman - 7 - Advent Pro - 7 - Alex Brush - 1 - Times New Roman - 2 - Belgrando - 6 - Belgrando - 4 - Helvetica - 3 - Alex Brush - 3 - Carter One - 1 - Advent Pro - 4 - Boogaloo - 9 - Carter One
COMPUTE AVERAGE
Note each font appears exactly twice.
Compute the average # of &s for each font
Index the average into the font name again
GILBERT
Apply the & to get its pair
